subject: Football
Domestic Violence
News and News Media
Discrimination
Race and Ethnicity
Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: The suspension of the ESPN host Stephen A. Smith for comments relating to domestic violence and the Ray Rice case exemplifies how opinions intended to prompt public reaction can backfire.
snippet: The suspension of the ESPN host Stephen A. Smith for comments relating to domestic violence and the Ray Rice case exemplifies how opinions intended to prompt public reaction can backfire.
